segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, waiting for her brother to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, but she’s part of this little scheme too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s the lookout or just the eager recipient.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she’s reaching up with her palm open is so cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost see the excitement in her eyes, even though it’s just a drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s standing just close enough to get a cookie but far enough to avoid blame.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s the smart one in this little operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is the one taking all the risks, and she’s just waiting for the reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how well they’re working together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they both get what they want without getting caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of those moments that makes me nostalgic for childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
